skillRows.name: A New Request?
skillRows.description:
ELF has two forms of Basic ATK:
Basic ATK 1: Launch syringes to deal 5 × 120% ATK of Lighting DMG.
Basic ATK 2: Unleash biochemical lightning to deal 3 × 200% ATK of Lighting DMG.
ATK Interval: 3.3s

skillRows.name: Sure, No Problem
skillRows.description: Each hit of Basic ATK has a 50.0% chance to inflict one stack of Fatigue on enemies. The chance is doubled on enemies not yet inflicted.

skillRows.name: Just Put It There
skillRows.description: ELF restores 2.1 SP per second in battle.

skillRows.name: I'll Finish It on Time
skillRows.description: ELF's basic ATKs deal 30.0% bonus Lightning DMG to enemies with Fatigue.

skillRows.name: Quick Sleep Helper
skillRows.description:
Take out a massive syringe and smash it at enemies to trigger a toxic explosion and deal 1800% ATK of Lighting DMG. The syringe then stays on the field and spread toxin to deal 7 × 300% ATK of Lightning DMG. Casting Ultimate reduces character switch CD by 8s. The 1st hit makes enemies take 10.0% bonus Lighting DMG for 15s. Ultimate inflicts Fatigue on enemies hit for 8s and each stack deals 20% ATK of Lightning DMG per second. Triggering it again resets the duration. 5 stacks max.
CD: 45s
SP: 75

skillRows.name: Never Gonna Wake Up Again
skillRows.description: ELF Ultimate makes enemies take 15.0% bonus Lightning DMG instead.

skillRows.name: Hmm, Very Helpful
skillRows.description: ELF Ultimate deals 40.0% bonus Total DMG. Casting Ultimate triggers the QTE of all Lightning DMG dealers on the team.

skillRows.name: Still Got Work to Do
skillRows.description: [Lineup] Elf deals 25% bonus Lightning DMG when the team leader is a Lightning DMG dealer.

skillRows.name: Can't Fall Asleep
skillRows.description: [Lineup] Lightning DMG dealers on the team deal 6.0% bonus Lightning DMG to paralyzed or fatigued enemies.

skillRows.name: Can't... Sleep...
skillRows.description: [Lineup] Every Lightning DMG dealer on the team reduces ELF's Ultimate CD by 8.0%.

skillRows.name: Did I Fall Asleep?
skillRows.description: Valkyries dealing Combo ATK DMG adds 1 to the count for up to once per second. When the count reaches 3, ELF performs a Joint ATK, clears the count, and launches multiple syringes at the target, dealing 10 x 80% ATK of Lightning DMG. CD: 20s. The count cannot exceed 2 during CD and starts with 2 when the battle begins.

skillRows.name: Oh No... I'm Done!
skillRows.description: ELF Joint ATKs boost team Total DMG by 5.0% for 12s.

skillRows.name: Another Sleepless Night
skillRows.description: Joint ATK CD is reduced to 15.0s.
